name: [REDACTED] Duality - GGJ 2022
description:
Star Interactive Media (1997 government interactive partner of the year) Presents:

"Welcome to the demonstration and training interactive tape. This tape will help guide through some scenarios you may encounter as part of the skeleton crew maintaining {REDACTED] testing facilities."

"PLEASE NOTE ANY GLITCHES, DUPLICATES OR MOVING ASSETS SEEN IN THIS DEMONSTRATION ARE TO BE IGNORED AND YOUR SUPERIOR OFFICER NOTIFIED IMMEDIATELY"

This was made in 2 days as part of GGJ-2022.

Playthrough here:

You can checkout the GGJ page here: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/duality-3-3
And the Australian Global Game Jam Site here: https://jamhost.org/e/0009T8QsaW/about
